member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram
member.summary: This tool creates a schematic diagram. Depending on the schematic builder, diagram creation can be based on feature layers, feature classes, object tables, a network analysis layer, or XML data.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.#ctor(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: out_location
param.summary:
Schematic dataset or schematic folder in which the diagram will be created.
This container must already exist. (In, Required)

member.param: Name of the schematic diagram to be created. (In, Required)
Schematic diagram template of the schematic diagram to be created. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.out_location
member.summary:
Schematic dataset or schematic folder in which the diagram will be created.
This container must already exist. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.out_name
member.summary: Name of the schematic diagram to be created. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.diagram_type
member.summary: Schematic diagram template of the schematic diagram to be created. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.in_data
member.summary: The input data required to generate the diagram. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.builder_options
member.summary: The schematic builder creation parameters. These are optional; they are only used for diagrams based on the Network Dataset builder to specify whether nodes will be merged. No option is required for the other schematic builders. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.out_diagram
member.summary: Output Schematic Diagram (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.CreateDiagram.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram
member.summary: Updates a schematic diagram. Depending on the schematic builder, the diagram update can be based on feature layers, feature classes, object tables, a solved network analysis, or an XML file.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The schematic diagram to be updated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.in_diagram
member.summary: The schematic diagram to be updated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.in_data
member.summary: The input data on which the diagram update will be based. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.builder_options
member.summary: The schematic builder update options. Update options are optional. They depend on the builder related to the diagram template that implements the specified schematic diagram. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.out_diagram
member.summary: Output Schematic Diagram (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagram.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams
member.summary: Updates schematic diagrams stored in a schematic dataset or schematic folder. All diagrams or a subset of diagrams (for example, diagrams related to a specific diagram template or diagrams that have not been updated for a particular number of days) can be updated.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The schematic dataset or schematic folder in which the diagrams are stored. This container must already exist. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.in_container
member.summary: The schematic dataset or schematic folder in which the diagrams are stored. This container must already exist. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.builder_options
member.summary: The schematic builder update options. They are optional. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.recursive
member.summary: Recursive Search (in, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.diagram_type
member.summary: The diagram template of the schematic diagram to update. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.last_update_criteria
member.summary: The number of days between diagram updates. The default is zero (0), meaning all diagrams will be updated daily. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.out_container
member.summary: Output Schematic Container (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.UpdateDiagrams.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram
member.summary: This tool converts a schematic diagram to feature classes or shapefiles.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The schematic diagram to be converted. (In, Required)
Workspace, feature dataset, or folder in which the schematic diagram will be converted. This container must already exist. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.in_diagram
member.summary: The schematic diagram to be converted. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.out_location
member.summary: Workspace, feature dataset, or folder in which the schematic diagram will be converted. This container must already exist. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.reuse_fc
member.summary: Indicates whether the input schematic diagram will be exported in the same feature classes/shapefiles as the other diagrams based on the same diagram template. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.export_related_attributes
member.summary: Indicates whether all the attributes stored in the feature classes/object tables associated with the schematic feature classes contained in the export diagram will be also exported. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.container_geometry
member.summary: Indicates the geometry type of the features that will be created for the exported schematic containers contained in the input diagram. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.config_keyword
member.summary: The configuration keyword that determines the storage parameters of the table in a relational database management system (RDBMS)This is for ArcSDE only. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.out_dataset
member.summary: Input Schematic Diagram (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SchematicsTools.ConvertDiagram.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.
